mm.icl.hlc.OntologyTools

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • mm.icl.hlc.OntologyTools.Context
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LowLevelContext, NutritionContext, PhysicalActivityContext

    public abstract class Context
extends java.lang.Object
implements IContext
    Context is the class encapsulating the OntModel associated to a context instance. This is an instance of the Context class in the Context Ontology which represents the Mining Minds Context Model. This class provides supporting methods to facilitate the access to the Context. .
    Since:
    2015-10-28
    Version:
    2.5
    Author:
    Claudia Villalonga and Muhammad Asif Razzaq

      Constructor of a new Context instance.

      Method to get the local name of the type of the Context Instance, e.g., Sitting or Standing for the category Activity of Low Level Context, and OfficeWork or Amusement for the PhysicalActivity and Nutrition Context.

      Method to get the type of the Context Instance, e.g., Sitting or Standing for the category Activity of Low Level Context, and OfficeWork or Amusement for the PhysicalActivity and Nutrition Context.

      • getCtxTypeName

        public java.lang.String getCtxTypeName()
        Method to get the type of the Context Instance, e.g., Sitting or Standing for the category Activity of Low Level Context, and OfficeWork or Amusement for the PhysicalActivity and Nutrition Context.

      • getCtxInstanceLocalName

        public java.lang.String getCtxInstanceLocalName()
        Method to get the local name of the Context Instance. The local name refers to the name without the ontology namespace.
        Returns:
        String representing the local name of the Context Instance.

      • getCtxTypeLocalName

        public java.lang.String getCtxTypeLocalName()
        Method to get the local name of the type of the Context Instance, e.g., Sitting or Standing for the category Activity of Low Level Context, and OfficeWork or Amusement for the PhysicalActivity and Nutrition Context. The local name refers to the name without the ontology namespace.
        Returns:
        String representing the local name of the type of the Context Instance.
